12907:
If I laid down my love to come to your defense
Would you worry for me with a pain in your chest?
Could I rely on your faith to be strong
To pick me back up and to push me along?
Tell me:
You'll be there in my hour of need
You won't turn me away
Help me out of the life I lead
Remember the promise you made
Remember the promise you made:
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233796)

What's the matter with the way we look?
surely it's not the end
i only meant to make my motions clear
you worry too much if it's understood
should we be seen as friends?
seems like a real good beginning right here
'cause when your heart is weak
i'm gonna pick the lock on it
my fingertips won't fail me
no matter what you do
the love you cannot see yet
is about to witness a dawning
and you can twist and turn
but you won't get loose
Better forget getting rid of me
...

Inside my domain

You can't know about everything
Only pleasure and pain

You wonder why I come here

With head to my hands

Where else can I be cured
And the king of your mansion
A thorn in your side

A child to protect
That claims he's free

Just around the corner

I don't know why

Don't make me cry
Don't make me cry

Suspicion's breeding here
The town's going insane
It's like a roundup
Boarding people on a cattle train

Anything you can't stop
Paranoia is a remedy
We can do anything we want
Hiding out in Owens Valley

Full moon over Manzanar
A little piece of the rising sun
We'll make a brand new start
And wait for peace to come
A full moon over Manzanar

I'm going to get my works
Weeks have passed without a single grain

I've taken a turn
I've lost what I once was craving
The oil will not burn, but I don't mind
One joy bang

(1409613233796)

Not without reason have I been wrong
Just a few tough demands
On a personal friend I could lean on
Desperate and selfish, I know that I was
We drank all our fill
But I'd swear there was poison in my cup
Of your good intentions what has become?

I thought you were on my side
Must you add the weight?
You said it would be even
When splitting up the stakes

Can't burn cedar, it must come out by the roots
I'm not driving, but I'm taking bets

One more stop after here through Midland I know
One more stop
One more stop after here through Midland I know
Till I come to rest
Till I come to rest

Turn back now and I might as well read my fortune
